attachments.title: lua RPC client by bfredl · Pull Request #11310 · neovim/neovim
attachments.text: Aim to make nvim lua a fully featured RPC client Add vim.rpcrequest and vim.rpcnotify, the later of which is available also in &quot;fast&quot; callbacks Add vim.NIL for a proper representation ...
